text: Ta chara ye tomadera dharma anusarana kare take chara imana eno na.’’ Tumi balo -- ''nihsandeha hedayata hacche allah‌ra hedayata, kaje'i tomadera ya deya hayechila tara mato an'yake deya hayeche, athaba tara tomadera prabhura samane tomadera upare prabhaba bistara karate pare.’’ Balo -- ''nihsandeha mahattba allah‌ra hate n'yasta, tini ta dana karena yake pachanda ka rena. Ara allah mahabadan'ya, sarbajnata.’’
